entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow or periods of rain early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023
